language.entry: Tusk

A crude plate of iron and cloth pauldrons adorned with fur is more than enough to guarantee protection. What the wears do not cover, scars and callused tissue more than seem to compensate for it. Truly modest unlike the killing tool of choice. The Tusk employs a deadly, yet curiously complex, device made out of what seems to be a gargantuan tooth, yet honed to pierce the toughest hide, the biggest beast and even the heaviest knight. It is big, clumsy, crude and deadly. Much like its owner.

The Tusk is out for two things: Blood and gold. Hired for the right price, this unrelenting killer will slay the biggest foes effortlessly. Sporting little garments, preffering to wear a short temper and a scarred body out for display, as if to defy anyone, or anything, unwise enough to approach. Could it also be guarding wounds deeper inside? However, this crude, savage and unsavory character is betrayed by the complex machinery at its disposal. A sign of thievery, or perhaps unprecedented ingenuity?

Seemingly unsociable and unrefined, the Tusk will make an effort to stay clear of fellow companions, with a peculiar excessive distrust toward the opposite sex. Quite familiar with survivalism and foraging, you could be forgiven for assuming the Tusk hasn't slept on a soft bed for her entire life. Perhaps, such an assessment would prove true, as uncivilized and nigh animalistic behavior seem to come naturally. It is rare for the Tusk to willingly seek kinship, but when done so, it is memorable and everlasting.

It's not a wound she can do anything about, but pure lingering anger, sometimes, can push some to surpass oneself.
I'M NOT DONE !
I SHALL NEVER REST UNTIL THE BLOOD DEBT IS PAID!
WOUND CARE
ENCOURAGE
PEP TALK
OVERCONFIDENCE
BOAST
UNCARING
FILTHY
Rub some dirt on it, ya wimp.
Yer bleeding like a stuck pig. Let me help.
That's gonna cost extra.
What are ya being so mopey for? The hunt has only just begun!
The bigger they are, the greater the pay.
Ye'd make a fine hunter.
It is not so bad to hunt in a pack, for a change.
A fat reward awaits us, so quit yer whining!
They are our prey, never forget that!
The thrill of the hunt is all I need!
No use idling when there is still game around!
Can we just go already?
Come on come on! I hate waiting!
What is taking so long? Let's just keep going!
I'm not being paid to just sit around! Let's move!
With me here, we are certain to succeed.
Let me tell ya about the time I killed a bear with my bare hands.
Ye think this is tough? HAH! Try wrestlin' a tiger!
These wounds are just new additions to my collection.
No beast has slain me yet, and that won't change now!
Bleed me, poison me, trample me... But the prey never escapes.
To become one with nature is the best camouflage.
They can't smell us if we smell just like them.
They will never see it coming.
THE HUNT BEGINS!
*snarl* AWOOOOOOOOOO!
I WILL DYE THESE WALLS WITH YER GUTS!
I've killed hares more fearsome than ya!
RAAAAAAAAARRRGH NONE SHALL ESCAPE!
SEVER THE SPINE! PIERCE THE HEART!
HAHAHAHA! HOW DO YA LIKE THAT?!
Th-this wasn't the deal!
They hunt for me!
The role of prey is most exciting!
Ye worthless dogs! Useless! All of ye!
I shall triple my share!
I tire of all this... Can we just stop?
AHAHAAAA! *growl* I FEEL IT!
To me, ye dogs! We will make it through this!
THEY ARE BUT LAMBS TO THE SLAUGHTER!
A well placed shot can fell even the largest beast!
I AM THE APEX! I AM YER DOOM!
There is a fortune to be made here. Eyes peeled!
More fearsome beasts have tried! And just as many have died!
Follow my lead, and we shall feast on their bones!
WE ARE THE WOLVES! THEY ARE BUT SHEEP!
Go for the vitals. Slay it in one blow!
ONLY THE STRONG SURVIVE! SHOW THEM OUR STRENGTH!
DO NOT LET OUR PREY ESCAPE! TONIGHT WE FEAST!
Ye think that wounds me? Bah!
Knock me down and I'll come back up twice as pissed!
Yer not paying me enough for this!
This is it! This is the end of us!
We're at the bottom of the food chain! Flee, ye fools!
They smell our fear! There is nowhere to go!
Ye all have set me up! I won't have it!
Yer all planning to take me out, weren't ya? WEREN'T YA?!
Hope ya choke on our bones!
AHAHAHAAAAA! THIS IS GONNA FEEL GOOD!
Claw me open! Spill my guts! Bathe in my blood!
I've never seen a more incompetent lot than all of ya imbeciles!
How can ye be so incompetent? Are ya even trying?!
It amazes me that any of ya have survived this long.
I will make it out of this by myself if needed!
I just need to run faster than all of ya.
When ye die, I shall take yer share.
I knew it was a mistake to group up with ye lot.
When I die, don't let them feast on my corpse!
Bury me with my money!
*hiss* RAAAAGH! *howl*
Ye want me to pay for this? ARE YA MAD?!
My skin itches! Flay me post haste!
There is no shame in retreat! Now ya face them!
I refuse to die here like a fool!
Shoo! Shoo!
Ye ain't taking my gold!
I am no fool, I know this is where they will strike!
I shan't become a hearty meal today!
Give me a new trophy! Right on my neck!
When they choke on me, cut them down!
My meat is most tender, come and taste it!
Oh, is that a coin I see?
By asserting dominance, I will infiltrate their pack!
I REGRET NOTHING!
I am no longer here.
They can't catch what they can't see!
Quick, pretend yer me and I'll pretend I'm an imbecile!
Do it. DO IT!
Make sure it will not be an open casket.
There is a time where every hunter must become prey.
My claws and fangs grow dull... I am utterely useless!
Ya seem more capable than I.
There is no hope, I am to become a corpse!
I will take them all on! As well as all of yer shares!
Yer not the only one thirsting for blood!
Mine! Mine! It will all be mine alone!
I've had my fill already.
Ya think I'll risk my hide for this? Pffff!
Coward! Stop hiding back there!
No! I won't fall victim to such foolishness!
I've lived long enough to recognize a stupid decision.
Ya take me for a fool?! I won't die in vain!
HAHAHA! AS IF I'D FALL FOR THAT!
Quit staring at me!
We've been ambushed! Run for it, ye dogs!
Quadruple my cut and then we'll talk.
Shut yer' trap, it's not worth my time.
Quit barkin', I ain't bitin'.
That would prove to be futile!
I have not what it takes to fell such a monstrosity!
Why would that even work now?
They can't see us if we hold our breaths!
*growl*
ARE YA MAD?! I KNOW I'M NOT!
I SEE THEM MOVE!
Fools! Take the opportunity at hand!
Strike as they are distracted!
A DISPLAY OF DOMINANCE IS IN ORDER!
I SHALL DRAW THEIR ATTENTION!
Leave me to bleed! I WELCOME IT!
Ye dogs! I know what's best!
WATCH THIS!
Touch me again and yer next!
I SHALL TAKE MY CUT NOW!
Maybe this will teach ya'll something!
HAHAHAHAAA! I SHALL DRINK THEIR BLOOD!
There is only one way out!
Follow my lead and only half of us shall fall!
It's all the same... We're no different from animals!
HERE COMES THE PAIN! *howl*
LEAVE NO ORPHANS!
lET US STRIKE A DEAL! RAAAARGH!
AWOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!
Doom shall befall us if we so much as rest our eyes.
They creep in the dark, hiding in the shadows!
*gasp* Did you see that?!
Avert yer gaze, cur!
They come for me! I can smell them!
They can't catch me if I don't sleep.
I hope nothing happens while I have my guard down. *chuckle*
My bones ache. How marvelous!
Oh! I think that's a new scar!
Yer all so pathetic... Are ya even tryin'?
Wake me and I'll strangle ya with yer own guts.
I catch ya lookin' again, I'll gouge yer eyes out.
Double my pay now or I walk.
Ye'd make for some great bait.
Y'know that we've made this far because of me, right?
Today is the day I return to the dirt.
I knew this was a bad idea...
Can we even make it through the night?
YE CAN TOUCH BUT YA CAN'T LOOK!
*cough* *cough* WHO COOKED THIS?
*snarl*
Do yer worse!
*whistle*
I shall become the bait!
My end draws near...
Oh! Me next! Me next!
*whimper*
I WARNED YA!
I KNOW YE'VE BEEN LAUGHING BEHIND MY BACK!
USELESS CUR! YA BE BETTER OFF WITH THE MAGGOTS!
How about a little incentive?
THIS IS HOW AN APEX MARKS ITS TERRITORY!
A wolf in sheep's clothing!
How about I even the odds a bit?
THIS IS HOW YA DO IT!
I will prolong this suffering no longer!
They shall feast on me, escape while ye can, fools!
*munch*
THIS SKIN IS NOT MY OWN!
They would just catch up with us!
Ye cowards! No easy pay for any of ya!
Futile...
No, this is where we belong.
No! The fun has JUST started!
Ya gotta learn to love the pain!
I WILL NOT SURRENDER MY PREY!
COWARD! DEFEND YER TERRITORY!
They come for me!
No! No! That wasn't the deal!
WHY ME?!
I EXPECTED AS SUCH!
I won't surrender my pay to anyone!
If I fall, yer all coming with me!
Yes! YES! THAT'S MORE LIKE IT!
That felt good.
*whine*
*hiss*
W-what?!
How could this be?!
YE'VE SET ME UP!
WHY DID YA WARN THEM?
There should be hell to pay for this!
Now take your revenge!
Nothing I could've done!
Oops! *giggle*
Y'know that won't get ya my share, right?
THAT WAS MY MARK, YOU CUR!
Pathetic. Apply yerself.
Any maggot could've done it.
DO. NOT. TOUCH MY PUPS!
WE SHALL FEAST ON ITS CARCASS!
That's it! Ya doomed us!
They're too strong! RETREAT! RETREAT!
Yer not even trying, are ya?
Who do ya think yer fooling with that?
AHAHAAA! You imbecile!
Ya keep that up and I'll feed ya to the dogs.
I am looking forward to lootin' yer corpse.
Yer worthless. I'll show ya how it's done!
Cur! Out of my pack!
Next time, try aiming.
I knew it! There is no escape!
Yer doomed!
I will not die here because of yer incompetence!
Yer all worthless! I alone will survive!
That was meant for me!
That felt good didn't it?
Useless maggot! At least die right!
Deserved.
Ye think yer special?
Yer fall will be but one of many!
Nothing but a fluke!
How long can ye keep that up?
Here they come again!
One of many! We can't dodge them all!
Ye dropped yer coins!
Quit playin' around!
Are ya mad?! That would kill us!
Absolutely not!
But that's what THEY want!
Ye won't make a prey out of me!
Ye will learn in time to bask in yer own blood.
A thousand lashes should do it.
I AM THE ONE IN CHARGE HERE!
Touch me again if ya wish to be mauled.
The age of man has to come an end!
*growl*
I won't fall for that. Again.
But what if we need it later?
No! I require bleeding!
But it feels so good like this!
Save it for someone who needs it.
I am not worth yer time...
What a waste of coin!
Accursed item! Begone!
Foul trickery! Away with ya!
I will not be sedated!
Lies! Yer trying to salt the wound!
I wear my scars with pride!
Yer soothing intentions are squandered here.
I won't let ya take this away from me!
Nothing could mend these scars.
It is only natural for me to perish here.
Accept yer fate. I have mine.
*snarl*
Such sorcery is not necessary!
Do not approach a wounded beast!
Yer mumbo jumbo can't fool me!
That is unecessary. We are doing fine as it is.
Ye mistake me for prey? ABSURD!
Take pride in yer weakness, you curs!
Such would not befit prey!
Do not empower the unwilling!
Useless on the meek.
To strengthen the weak is futile.
I am no hunter! Leave me be!
All I need is my own power!
Do not depend on such trickery! It is but an illusion!
Ye cannot mend what our minds have shattered.
It gnaws at my soul!
The maws of death gape in front of me!
My flesh rots! Make it stop!
Nothing quite like a handsome pay for an ugly beast.
Hunting in packs is a new experience. Hopefully most efficient.
I have no use for trophies. The hunt and the pay is my life.
tusk

A crude plate of iron and cloth pauldrons adorned with fur is more than enough to guarantee protection. What the wears do not cover, scars and callused tissue more than seem to compensate for it. Truly modest unlike the killing tool of choice. The Tusk employs a deadly, yet curiously complex, device made out of what seems to be a gargantuan tooth, yet honed to pierce the toughest hide, the biggest beast and even the heaviest knight. It is big, clumsy, crude and deadly. Much like its owner.

The Tusk is out for two things: Blood and gold. Hired for the right price, this unrelenting killer will slay the biggest foes effortlessly. Sporting little garments, preffering to wear a short temper and a scarred body out for display, as if to defy anyone, or anything, unwise enough to approach. Could it also be guarding wounds deeper inside? However, this crude, savage and unsavory character is betrayed by the complex machinery at its disposal. A sign of thievery, or perhaps unprecedented ingenuity?

Seemingly unsociable and unrefined, the Tusk will make an effort to stay clear of fellow companions, with a peculiar excessive distrust toward the opposite sex. Quite familiar with survivalism and foraging, you could be forgiven for assuming the Tusk hasn't slept on a soft bed for her entire life. Perhaps, such an assessment would prove true, as uncivilized and nigh animalistic behavior seem to come naturally. It is rare for the Tusk to willingly seek kinship, but when done so, it is memorable and everlasting.

A crude plate of iron and cloth pauldrons adorned with fur is more than enough to guarantee protection. What the wears do not cover, scars and callused tissue more than seem to compensate for it. Truly modest unlike the killing tool of choice. The Tusk employs a deadly, yet curiously complex, device made out of what seems to be a gargantuan tooth, yet honed to pierce the toughest hide, the biggest beast and even the heaviest knight. It is big, clumsy, crude and deadly. Much like its owner.

The Tusk is out for two things: Blood and gold. Hired for the right price, this unrelenting killer will slay the biggest foes effortlessly. Sporting little garments, preffering to wear a short temper and a scarred body out for display, as if to defy anyone, or anything, unwise enough to approach. Could it also be guarding wounds deeper inside? However, this crude, savage and unsavory character is betrayed by the complex machinery at its disposal. A sign of thievery, or perhaps unprecedented ingenuity?

Seemingly unsociable and unrefined, the Tusk will make an effort to stay clear of fellow companions, with a peculiar excessive distrust toward the opposite sex. Quite familiar with survivalism and foraging, you could be forgiven for assuming the Tusk hasn't slept on a soft bed for her entire life. Perhaps, such an assessment would prove true, as uncivilized and nigh animalistic behavior seem to come naturally. It is rare for the Tusk to willingly seek kinship, but when done so, it is memorable and everlasting.

A crude plate of iron and cloth pauldrons adorned with fur is more than enough to guarantee protection. What the wears do not cover, scars and callused tissue more than seem to compensate for it. Truly modest unlike the killing tool of choice. The Tusk employs a deadly, yet curiously complex, device made out of what seems to be a gargantuan tooth, yet honed to pierce the toughest hide, the biggest beast and even the heaviest knight. It is big, clumsy, crude and deadly. Much like its owner.

The Tusk is out for two things: Blood and gold. Hired for the right price, this unrelenting killer will slay the biggest foes effortlessly. Sporting little garments, preffering to wear a short temper and a scarred body out for display, as if to defy anyone, or anything, unwise enough to approach. Could it also be guarding wounds deeper inside? However, this crude, savage and unsavory character is betrayed by the complex machinery at its disposal. A sign of thievery, or perhaps unprecedented ingenuity?

Seemingly unsociable and unrefined, the Tusk will make an effort to stay clear of fellow companions, with a peculiar excessive distrust toward the opposite sex. Quite familiar with survivalism and foraging, you could be forgiven for assuming the Tusk hasn't slept on a soft bed for her entire life. Perhaps, such an assessment would prove true, as uncivilized and nigh animalistic behavior seem to come naturally. It is rare for the Tusk to willingly seek kinship, but when done so, it is memorable and everlasting.

A crude plate of iron and cloth pauldrons adorned with fur is more than enough to guarantee protection. What the wears do not cover, scars and callused tissue more than seem to compensate for it. Truly modest unlike the killing tool of choice. The Tusk employs a deadly, yet curiously complex, device made out of what seems to be a gargantuan tooth, yet honed to pierce the toughest hide, the biggest beast and even the heaviest knight. It is big, clumsy, crude and deadly. Much like its owner.

The Tusk is out for two things: Blood and gold. Hired for the right price, this unrelenting killer will slay the biggest foes effortlessly. Sporting little garments, preffering to wear a short temper and a scarred body out for display, as if to defy anyone, or anything, unwise enough to approach. Could it also be guarding wounds deeper inside? However, this crude, savage and unsavory character is betrayed by the complex machinery at its disposal. A sign of thievery, or perhaps unprecedented ingenuity?

Seemingly unsociable and unrefined, the Tusk will make an effort to stay clear of fellow companions, with a peculiar excessive distrust toward the opposite sex. Quite familiar with survivalism and foraging, you could be forgiven for assuming the Tusk hasn't slept on a soft bed for her entire life. Perhaps, such an assessment would prove true, as uncivilized and nigh animalistic behavior seem to come naturally. It is rare for the Tusk to willingly seek kinship, but when done so, it is memorable and everlasting.

tusk

A crude plate of iron and cloth pauldrons adorned with fur is more than enough to guarantee protection. What the wears do not cover, scars and callused tissue more than seem to compensate for it. Truly modest unlike the killing tool of choice. The Tusk employs a deadly, yet curiously complex, device made out of what seems to be a gargantuan tooth, yet honed to pierce the toughest hide, the biggest beast and even the heaviest knight. It is big, clumsy, crude and deadly. Much like its owner.

The Tusk is out for two things: Blood and gold. Hired for the right price, this unrelenting killer will slay the biggest foes effortlessly. Sporting little garments, preffering to wear a short temper and a scarred body out for display, as if to defy anyone, or anything, unwise enough to approach. Could it also be guarding wounds deeper inside? However, this crude, savage and unsavory character is betrayed by the complex machinery at its disposal. A sign of thievery, or perhaps unprecedented ingenuity?

Seemingly unsociable and unrefined, the Tusk will make an effort to stay clear of fellow companions, with a peculiar excessive distrust toward the opposite sex. Quite familiar with survivalism and foraging, you could be forgiven for assuming the Tusk hasn't slept on a soft bed for her entire life. Perhaps, such an assessment would prove true, as uncivilized and nigh animalistic behavior seem to come naturally. It is rare for the Tusk to willingly seek kinship, but when done so, it is memorable and everlasting.
